snippet.title: Assetto Corsa Competizione - Cars and Tracks. Coming to PS4 and Xbox One June 23 [ESRB]
snippet.description:
Assetto Corsa Competizione, the Official GT World Challenge title, is heading to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on June 23, 2020. What’s more, players who pre-order the console edition of ACC will also gain access to the Intercontinental GT Pack DLC on release day, which expands the Assetto Corsa Competizione experience to include the official Intercontinental GT Challenge. 

The Intercontinental GT Pack DLC is scheduled to launch later this summer. For more info and to pre-order, head on over to - https://acc.505games.com/

For behind the scenes details on all of 505's games, head to the official 505 Games Blog: http://www.505games.com/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
